valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 8 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 9 Jan 2026

Easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5 increasing 6 to gale 8.

Slight or moderate becoming moderate or rough, then rough or very rough later.

Wintry showers.

Good, occasionally poor.
